title: Fanart of that time you went to Spicy Crust Pizza
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

The night is winding down and you need something to eat. You look at the other side of the street and see a glowing sign.

**"Spicy Crust Pizza"**

It says, with big neon letters. You cross the street and enter.

The whole place is empty and it looks like the set-dressing for a bad film. The cashier looks up at you. Their eyes tired and bloodshot and their uniform messy and weirdly off-color.

They haphazardly point at the menu, which is plastered on the wall above their head. Without even looking at it, you ask for a "Spicy Crust Pizza Margherita". The employee nods and goes out back.

You stay in the middle of the empty restaurant, awkwardly. Your stomach rumbles. You can't decide if it's better to sit down on one of the empty tables or just wait standing. While your mind is occupied with this conundrum, you lose track of time.

The cashier comes back, a box on their hands, with a pizza on top of it. You fumble as you try to pay. It's too expensive but you don't care.

You take the pizza and sit on one of the tables. Eager to eat, you bite down on a slice.

Your mouth is filled with flavour. Strong. Hot. Spicy. 

This how you look like:

[[image Ilustracio%CC%81n_sin_ti%CC%81tulo-34.jpg]]
